textAfterTable: Lexmark International Inc's Pretax Income for the quarter that ended in Mar. 2015 is calculated as Pretax Income = Operating Income + Non-Recurring Items + Interest Expense + Interest Income + Other = 42.2 + 0.8 + 0 + 0 + -9.3 = 34 Lexmark International Inc Pre-Tax Income for the trailing twelve months (TTM) ended in Mar. 2015 was 54.7 (Jun. 2014 ) + 45.3 (Sep. 2014 ) + -31.8 (Dec. 2014 ) + 33.7 (Mar. 2015 ) = $102 Mil. * All numbers are in millions except for per share data and ratio. All numbers are in their own currency. Explanation Lexmark International Inc's Pretax Margin for the quarter that ended in Mar. 2015 is calculated as Pretax Margin = Pretax Income / Revenue = 33.7 / 852 = 3.96% During the past 13 years, Lexmark International Inc's highest Pretax Margin was 14.05%. The lowest was 2.21%. And the median was 9.78%. * All numbers are in millions except for per share data and ratio. All numbers are in their own currency.
